name: Is This Wrong?
description:
One of the most absurd kind of games I know is the platformers, where all you do is walking around and collecting coins. So I have now made a first person collect coins platformer. But I might have made a bit weird. 

Controls:

The game is controlled with the classic WASD and spacebar + moving the mouse. 

You can quit the game with the escape key.

Warning

This game contains a lot of flashing lights and a very shaking camera. This can trigger epileptic seizures, and makes you motion sick.

This warning is NOT a joke.

If you play the game and begin to feel bad, then press the escape key to quit the game.

GOOOOOOD luck and hope I hope you will have fun trying the game
